WorkItem.ClosedComment: Use the other branches for older IDEs.
WorkItem.Description: I downloaded the NerdDinner sources to try and build it because the one I'm doing by hand won't compile. To my sorrow, the IDEs (both 2008 & 2005) won't open the project file. Apparantly it is a 2003 file and neither of the two IDE's I have know how to convert it for some reason ???
WorkItem.Summary: NerdDinner CSPROJ won't open with Viz Studio 2008, 2005

Comments.Message: I think you should be opening the .sln file in the IDE.
Also make sure you have MVC installed. Visual Studio will complain about the project file otherwise.
